synopsis.text:
Hawk of the Battlefield, Guts, a lone mercenary with a colossal sword, finds himself in a century-long war-ravaged land. His formidable combat skills and ruthless demeanor catch the eye of Griffith, the charismatic and enigmatic leader of the mercenary group, the Band of the Hawk. After a fateful duel, Guts is defeated and reluctantly joins the Band of the Hawk, forging unbreakable bonds with his new comrades and their leader.

As the Band of the Hawk's reputation and influence grow, so does Guts' internal struggle with his life as a sword for hire. He starts to question his allegiance to Griffith's dream of ruling a kingdom, unaware of the sinister destiny lurking in the shadows.

This is the return of Kentaro Miura's iconic series, Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition, featuring new cuts, including the 'Bonfire of Dreams' scene and a haunting soundtrack by Susumu Hirasawa and Shiro Sagisu. Prepare for a gripping tale of camaraderie, ambition, and betrayal in this TV broadcast of the Golden Age film trilogy.
